nodes.text: Bongo Fast Lasers were upgraded Bongo Lasers, variants of the Tribubble bongo and were used as heavy destroyers in the Gungan fleet. They were armed with a panel of lasers for anti-ship duty in the front of the vessel, and they had a similar crescent-shaped appearance to the Tribubble bongo, and were piloted by two individuals in separate cockpits. Bongo Lasers were driven by one propeller and constructed at shipyards by the Bongomeken Collective for a cost of 100 units of carbon and 25 units of nova crystals. Bongo Fast Lasers saw action against the Trade Federation in 32 BBY during the occupation of Naboo.
Bongo Fast Lasers appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack. They are the Gungan heavy destroyer units.
